name: Aliena Pte Ltd
description: Manufacturer of low-power propulsion systems designed to enhance the performance of satellites in advanced maneuvers in space. The company's systems include miniaturized propulsion systems and end-to-end remote sensing devices for data acquisition and analytics, enabling small satellite designers to get an ideal propulsion system for small satellite missions.
one_liner: Manufacturer of low-power propulsion systems designed to enhance the performance of satellites in advanced maneuvers in space. The company's systems include miniaturized propulsion systems and end-to-end remote sensing devices for data acquisition and analytics, enabling small satellite designers to get an ideal propulsion system for small satellite missions.
